ComicInfo.Title: Barbary Coast, Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary: Christmas 1944 sees Captain Greg Mallory safely in reserve, far from the front line with Nazi Germany. A good time to rest and refit, to recover from the horrors of war. Not such a good time for a unit of very special soldiers- backed by the Vought-American-Consolidated corp- to show up looking for combat experience. Hughie gets a war story he'll never forget, as the Battle Of The Bulge begins with a bang... The Boys #53, part two of Barbary Coast.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:21:20. [CVDB267602]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John McCrea, John McCrea, Keith Burns, Keith Burns
ComicInfo.Inker: John McCrea, John McCrea, Keith Burns, Keith Burns
ComicInfo.Characters: Crimson Countess, Eagle the Archer, Greg Mallory, Laddio, Manbot, Soldier Boy, Steel Knight, The Buzzer, Wee Hughie
ComicInfo.Teams: The Avenging Squad, United States Army, Vought American, Waffen SS
